article.headline: Bucknell 88, Cornell 75
article.story: LEWISBURG, Pa. (AP) -- John Griffin scored 27 points to lead Bucknell to an 88-75 victory over Cornell on Wednesday. Justin Castleberry added 18 points for Bucknell (4-5) while Josh Linthicum had 12 and Stephen Tyree grabbed 10 rebounds. Collin Robinson scored 21 points for Cornell (4-3) and Louis Dale had 17, including a 12-for-12 performance from the free-throw line. Ryan Wittman scored 16 points and Jeff Foote had 10 points and 11 rebounds. Griffin scored 13 points as Bucknell closed out the first half with a 22-10 run to take a 47-30 lead at the break. The Bison led throughout the second half by as much as 21 points. Bucknell hit eight 3-pointers in the first half and was 11-for-21 in 3-pointers for the game.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
